body:
Love these NTRs where the bf is retard and doesn't deserve her. These kind of bfs/Mcs are type that made me like ntr.
Gud thing no fat/ugly bastards tho
Idk why but I don't mind this kind of NTR, still waiting for English translation
...ALMOST EVERY FUCKIN TANK,STORY,DOUJIN SOMEONE SHIT OUT TO THIS FUCKING SITE IS FUCKING NTRASH.WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE?
Pretty meh actually... Nothing new and special

I agree that NTR without ugly bastards is about 10x more tolerable. But at the same time, this is (like almost all) story is just anther example of something that would be just as enjoyable (if not more) if it was simply blackmail/mind control/rape, ETC. I really don’t understand the need for so many good doujins to do it to interject NTR into what would otherwise be very enjoyable doujins.
Not a fan of NTR; but at least she's not cheating with an ugly bastard.
